Behavior Modulation

Contents

  • Schema
  • Example

Behavior Modulation#

Schema#

$schema: "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema"
$id: /schemas/behavior_modulation
title: BehaviorModulation
type: object
properties:
  type: string
  enabled: boolean
required: [type]
additionalProperties: {}

Example#

type: Relaxation
enabled: true
